sources.title: War Flowers | FULL MOVIE | 2012 | Civil War, Historical Drama | Tom Berenger, Christina Ricci
sources.description:
A young mother (Christina Ricci) and her daughter fend for themselves after her husband leaves to fight in the Civil War. They are placed in mortal danger when they help to hide a wounded Yankee soldier (Jason Gedrick) from Confederate soldiers.

Director Serge Rodnunsky
Stars Christina Ricci, Jason Gedrick, Gabrielle Popa, Bren Foster, Scott Michael Campbell, Tom Berenger
2012

metadata.Plot: It is 1863, and the American Civil War is raging. With her husband, John, away fighting with the Confederacy, and their baby lost to scarlet fever, Sarah Ellis, and their precocious daughter Melody, struggle to survive on their family farm, save for Melody's extraordinary good sense and fortitude. When Melody finds a wounded Union soldier in their basement, Sarah and the soldier forge an unlikely bond, a bond that just might help Sarah and Melody find peace enough to move forward after the War.
